product_name: Columbia Pardon My Trench Rain Jacket - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: For urban adventures, the women's Columbia Pardon My Trench Rain Jacket offers rain resistance, extended length and a belted waist so you stay in style while you stay dry on drizzly days. Nylon shell has a subtle dobby texture and Omni-Shield(R) durable water repellent finish that resists rain and stains. Polyester mesh lining in the main body increases airflow and comfort; nylon taffeta sleeve lining glides on easily over a sweater. Adjustable belt ties in front. The Columbia Pardon My Trench Rain Jacket features zippered hand pockets, drawcord-adjustable storm hood, back vent and adjustable cuffs.
short_description: For urban adventures, the women's Columbia Pardon My Trench Rain Jacket offers rain resistance, extended length and a belted waist so you stay in style while you stay dry on drizzly days.
